This channel is now connected to other servers' OpenChat channels!

**Features:**
â€¢ Messages here are shared with other OpenChat channels
â€¢ Images require clicking a button to view (for safety)
â€¢ Files show security warnings before download

**Rules:**
â€¢ No NSFW content
â€¢ Follow Discord's Terms of Service
â€¢ Be respectful to other servers

**Note:** Anyone can disable OpenChat in this channel, and admins can disable it server-wide with `/disable openchat`

help_overview_description:
Welcome to PuddlesBot! I'm your friendly duck companion with lots of features to help manage your server.

**Note:** Command names stay in English (like `/help`, `/coinflip`) but all content is displayed in your selected language.
help_quick_start_text:
â€¢ Use `/help` to see all commands
â€¢ Set your language with `/language`
â€¢ Check out `/task` for task management
â€¢ Try `/quack` for some fun!
help_footer: Use the buttons below to navigate â€¢ Made with â¤ï¸ by the PuddlesBot2 team
help_key_features_text:
â€¢ **Multi-Assignee Tasks** - Assign tasks to multiple users
â€¢ **Task Sniping** - Claim credit for others' completed tasks
â€¢ **AI Chat System** - Mention the bot for AI responses
â€¢ **OpenChat System** - Cross-server communication channels
â€¢ **Feature Management** - Control which systems are enabled
â€¢ **Persistent Views** - Buttons work after bot restarts
â€¢ **Dual XP System** - Separate text/voice XP tracking
â€¢ **High-Quality Music** - Multi-platform streaming
help_ai_disclaimer:
ğŸ¤– **AI Chat System**
â€¢ AI responses may contain inaccurate information
â€¢ Do not use for medical, legal, or financial advice
â€¢ Always verify important information
help_openchat_disclaimer:
ğŸŒ **OpenChat System**
â€¢ Cross-server messages are not moderated
â€¢ Files and images are not scanned for malware
â€¢ Download attachments at your own risk
â€¢ NSFW content is strictly prohibited
help_page_info: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Use the buttons to navigate
help_task_description: Comprehensive task management system with multi-user support
help_task_creating_text:
`/task` - Create new task assigned to multiple users
â€¢ Format: `/task assigned_to: @user1 @user2 @user3`
â€¢ All assignees get credit when any one completes it

`/taskedit` - Edit existing tasks or delete them
â€¢ Change name, due date, description, or assignees
â€¢ Delete option available for cleanup
help_task_viewing_text:
`/mytasks` - View all tasks assigned to you
`/showtasks @user` - View tasks assigned to specific user
`/alltasks` - View all active server tasks (paginated)
`/oldtasks @user` - View completed tasks with stats
help_task_sniping_text:
`/snipe` - Claim credit for completed tasks
â€¢ Select from available tasks assigned to others
â€¢ Requires admin approval in designated channel
â€¢ Won't be marked as late even if past due date
â€¢ Shows as 'sniped' in task history

`/setsnipe #channel` - **[Admin]** Set snipe request channel
`/clearsnipes` - **[Admin]** Clear pending snipe requests
help_task_permissions_text:
`/tcw @user add/remove` - **[Admin]** Manage task creator whitelist
â€¢ Only admins and whitelisted users can create tasks
â€¢ Prevents spam and maintains organization
help_task_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Tasks support multi-assignee workflows!
help_interactive_description: Create interactive messages with buttons for tickets and role management
help_interactive_creation_text:
`/intmsg` - Create interactive messages with buttons
â€¢ Ticket creation buttons with custom questions
â€¢ Role assignment/removal buttons
â€¢ Custom embed styling and content
â€¢ Persistent - works after bot restarts
help_interactive_management_text:
`/editintmsg [message_id]` - **[Staff]** Edit existing messages
`/listmessages` - **[Staff]** List all interactive messages
â€¢ View message IDs and channels
â€¢ Quick access to edit existing messages
help_interactive_tickets_text:
`/ticketstats` - **[Staff]** View ticket statistics
â€¢ Recent ticket activity
â€¢ Response time analytics
â€¢ User interaction patterns
help_interactive_permissions_text:
`/imw @user add/remove` - **[Admin]** Manage interactive message whitelist
â€¢ Control who can create interactive messages
â€¢ Maintain message quality and organization
help_interactive_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Create engaging server interactions!
help_leveling_description: Dual XP system tracking both text and voice activity
help_leveling_progress_text:
`/rank @user` - View detailed rank card
â€¢ Text and voice XP progress bars
â€¢ Server ranking position
â€¢ Visual progress indicators

`/top` - Display leaderboards
â€¢ Sort by text XP, voice XP, or total XP
â€¢ Top users in the server
help_leveling_admin_text:
`/setxp @user` - **[Admin]** Set user's text or voice XP
`/setlevel @user` - **[Admin]** Set user's text or voice level
`/lvlreset @user` - **[Admin]** Reset user's levels and XP data
help_leveling_config_text:
`/lvlconfig` - **[Admin]** Configure XP system
â€¢ XP rates and cooldowns
â€¢ Server-specific settings
â€¢ Anti-spam protection
help_leveling_testing_text:
`/testxp @user` - **[Admin]** Manually award XP
`/testvoice @user` - **[Admin]** Simulate voice time
`/debugxp @user` - **[Admin]** Debug XP system status
help_leveling_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Dual XP system with anti-spam protection!
help_invite_description: Monitor server growth and track invite analytics
help_invite_stats_text:
`/topinvite` - Show top 10 inviters in server
`/showinvites @user` - Detailed invite stats for user
â€¢ Total invites, joins, and leaves
â€¢ Success rate and activity tracking
help_invite_admin_text:
`/resetinvites` - **[Admin]** Reset all invite data
â€¢ Requires confirmation for safety

`/editinvites @user` - **[Admin]** Edit user invite stats
â€¢ Adjust invite counts manually
help_invite_system_text:
`/invitesync` - **[Admin]** Manually sync invite data
`/invitestats` - **[Admin]** Comprehensive server invite stats
`/invitereset` - **[Admin]** Reset tracking tables
â€¢ **Warning:** Deletes all invite data permanently
help_invite_permissions_text:
`/invw @user add/remove` - **[Admin]** Manage invite admin whitelist
â€¢ Control access to invite management commands
help_invite_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Track server growth effectively!
help_music_description: High-quality music streaming with multi-platform support
help_music_playback_text:
`/play [song]` - Play music from multiple platforms
â€¢ YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud, Apple Music
â€¢ Supports playlists and direct links

`/pause` / `/resume` - Pause or resume current track
`/skip` / `/back` - Navigate through queue
`/stop` / `/leave` - Stop music and leave channel
help_music_queue_text:
`/queue` - View current music queue
`/shuffle` - Shuffle the current queue
`/loop [mode]` - Set loop mode (off/track/queue)
`/nowplaying` - Show currently playing track
help_music_quality_text:
`/volume [0-100]` - Adjust music volume
`/quality` - **[Manager]** Manage audio quality settings
`/audiostats` - Show audio performance metrics
`/search [query]` - Search across platforms
help_music_features_text:
â€¢ **Multi-Platform Support** - YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud & more
â€¢ **High-Quality Audio** - Configurable quality presets
â€¢ **Smart Queue** - Playlist support with shuffle
â€¢ **Performance Metrics** - Real-time audio statistics
help_music_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Powered by Vocard & Lavalink!
help_utility_description: Essential server management and user utility commands
help_utility_user_text:
`/profile @user` - View customizable personal profile
`/user @user` - Show user info (ID, join date, etc.)
`/avatar @user` - Get user's avatar image
`/roles` - List all server roles and member counts
help_utility_server_text:
`/server` - Show detailed server information
â€¢ Member count, channels, creation date
â€¢ Server features and statistics
help_utility_voice_text:
`/moveme [channel/user]` - Move yourself to voice channel
â€¢ Move to specific channel or follow another user
help_utility_moderation_text:
`/ban @user [reason]` - **[Admin]** Ban member from server
`/kick @user [reason]` - **[Admin]** Kick member from server
`/purge [number] @user` - **[Staff]** Clean up messages
â€¢ Mass delete messages with optional user filter
help_utility_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Essential server management tools!
help_fun_description: Entertainment commands and mini-games to brighten your day
help_fun_random_text:
`/quack` - Get a random duck image ğŸ¦†
â€¢ Powered by random-d.uk API
â€¢ Adorable duck photos to brighten your day

`/meme` - Get a random meme ğŸ˜‚
â€¢ Fresh memes from Reddit
â€¢ NSFW content automatically filtered
â€¢ Shows upvotes, subreddit, and original post
help_fun_games_text:
`/coinflip` - Flip a coin! Heads or Tails? ğŸª™
â€¢ Uses real coin images from collection
â€¢ Random selection from heads/tails folders

`/diceroll [1-100]` - Roll dice with visual results
â€¢ Customizable dice count
â€¢ Visual dice display with statistics
help_fun_ai_text:
`@PuddlesBot [message]` - Chat with AI assistant
â€¢ Mention the bot followed by your question or message
â€¢ Casual, friendly Discord-style responses
â€¢ Remembers recent conversation context
â€¢ Example: `@PuddlesBot what's Python programming?`

âš ï¸ **Important**: AI may provide inaccurate information.
Do not use for medical, legal, or financial advice.
help_fun_navigation_text:
`/help` - Show this paginated help system
â€¢ Navigate through different command categories
â€¢ Comprehensive command documentation
help_fun_features_text:
â€¢ **Visual Results** - Coinflip shows actual coin images
â€¢ **Smart Filtering** - Memes are family-friendly
â€¢ **Rich Information** - Detailed meme metadata
â€¢ **Random Variety** - Fresh content every time
help_fun_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Have fun and enjoy!
help_admin_description: Advanced administrative tools and system management
help_admin_features_text:
`/disable [feature]` - **[Admin]** Disable specific bot features
â€¢ Turn off leveling, music, AI chat, etc.
â€¢ Granular control over bot systems

`/enable [feature]` - **[Admin]** Re-enable disabled features
â€¢ Restore functionality of disabled systems

`/features` - View status of all bot features
â€¢ See what's enabled/disabled
â€¢ Track who disabled features and why
help_admin_openchat_text:
`/openchat enable` - Enable cross-server chat in a channel
`/openchat disable` - **[Admin]** Disable OpenChat in channel
`/openchat status` - Check OpenChat settings

âš ï¸ **Security Notes:**
â€¢ Files are not scanned for malware
â€¢ NSFW content is strictly prohibited
â€¢ Admins can disable system with `/disable openchat`
help_admin_messaging_text:
`/msg #channel` - **[Admin]** Send your next message to any channel
â€¢ Supports multi-line messages and attachments
â€¢ Enables @everyone, @here, and role pings
â€¢ Wait for your next message after running command
help_admin_database_text:
`/fixdb` - **[Admin]** Fix database schema issues
â€¢ Repair corrupted tables
â€¢ Update schema to latest version

`/testpersistence` - **[Admin]** Test persistence system
â€¢ Verify button functionality after restarts
help_admin_owner_text:
`/multidimensionaltravel` - **[Owner]** Get invites to opted-in servers
â€¢ Access servers that enabled the feature

`/gigaop` - **[Owner]** Grant admin permissions for debugging
â€¢ Temporary admin access for troubleshooting
help_admin_permissions_text:
**[Owner]** - Bot owner only (ID: 699995264550961193)
**[Admin]** - Requires Administrator permission
**[Staff]** - Requires Manage Messages permission
**[Manager]** - Requires Manage Server permission
help_admin_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Use admin commands responsibly!
help_credits_description: Special thanks to all the amazing projects and services that make PuddlesBot2 possible
help_credits_music_text:
**[Vocard](https://github.com/ChocoMeow/Vocard)** - Advanced music bot framework
â€¢ Multi-platform music streaming
â€¢ High-quality audio processing

**[Lavalink](https://github.com/lavalink-devs/Lavalink)** - Audio delivery node
â€¢ Efficient audio streaming
â€¢ Load balancing and performance
help_credits_fun_text:
**[Meme API](https://github.com/D3vd/Meme_Api)** - Random memes from Reddit
â€¢ Fresh meme content with metadata
â€¢ NSFW filtering and quality control

**[Random Duck API](https://random-d.uk/)** - Adorable duck images
â€¢ High-quality duck photography
â€¢ Instant mood boosters ğŸ¦†
help_credits_coinflip_text:
**Coin Images** - Various online sources
â€¢ Images sourced from random websites
â€¢ No ownership claimed - will remove upon request
â€¢ Contact us if you own any images and want them removed
help_credits_thanks_text:
**[EcoEngine](https://ecoengine.net/)** - Supporting Mallard Motorsports
â€¢ Sponsoring the team and its projects
â€¢ Enabling continued development and innovation
â€¢ Thank you for believing in our mission! ğŸš€
help_credits_development_text:
â€¢ **Discord.py** - Python Discord API wrapper
â€¢ **SQLAlchemy** - Database ORM framework
â€¢ **Our amazing community** - Beta testers and feedback providers
â€¢ **Open source contributors** - Making everything possible
help_credits_footer: Page {current} of {total} â€¢ Made with â¤ï¸ by the PuddlesBot2 team
